content.lead: GameGuru MAX offers a powerful behavior system that allows you to create complex interactions without writing code. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the fundamentals of behavior implementation, from basic object interactions to advanced AI systems.

sections.title: Understanding Behaviors
sections.content: Behaviors in GameGuru MAX are pre-built scripts that you can attach to objects to give them specific functionality. Think of them as "plug-and-play" components that handle common game mechanics like doors, switches, AI, and more.

sections.title: Basic Behavior Implementation
list: Select an object in your scene
Open the Properties panel and go to the Behaviors tab
Choose a behavior from our comprehensive library
Configure the properties to match your needs
Test in-game to see the behavior in action

sections.title: Popular Behavior Categories
sections.content: Our behavior library is organized into several categories to help you find what you need:
list: Doors & Interaction: Create interactive doors, switches, and objects
AI & NPCs: Add intelligent characters and creatures
Effects & Atmosphere: Enhance your game's visual and audio experience
Game Mechanics: Implement core gameplay systems

sections.title: Best Practices
sections.content: When working with behaviors, keep these tips in mind:
list: Always test behaviors in a controlled environment first
Read the documentation for each behavior thoroughly
Start with simple behaviors and gradually add complexity
Use the search function to find specific behaviors quickly

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.content: Now that you understand the basics, explore our behavior library to find the perfect components for your game. Each behavior includes detailed documentation, property explanations, and step-by-step tutorials to help you succeed.

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.content: Use the search function in the navigation bar to quickly find behaviors by name, category, or functionality. You can also browse by category using the sidebar navigation.
